pages.title: Overchanting
pages.text: Being so familiar with both magic and the $(l:enchanting/enchanter)Enchanter$() opened new doors for you:$(br)Overchanting.$(br2)Pressing so much magical energy into a single $(item)Enchanted Book$() will be pricey. $(italic)Very pricey().

pages.title: Vanilla Enchantments
pages.text: $(li)Bane of Arthropods: 5 => 8$(li)Blast Protection: 4 => 8$(li)Depth Strider: 3 => 3$(li)Efficiency: 5 => 8$(li)Feather Falling: 4 => 6$(li)Fire Aspect: 2 => 4$(li)Fire Protection: 4 => 8$(li)Fortune: 3 => 5$(li)Frost Walker: 2 => 4$(li)Impaling: 5 => 8$(li)Knockback: 2 => 5$(li)Looting: 3 => 6$(li)Loyalty: 3 => 4$(li)Luck of the Sea: 3 => 5
